ctx: intros d1 d2 Hincl tr H.
exceptions.exn: The reference Ht was not found in the current environment.

original: intros d1 d2 Hincl tr H. unfold Included in Hincl. intros x Ht. destruct Ht as [n Ht]. exists n. induction n. - destruct Ht as [tr1 [tr2 [Hd1 [Hd2 Heq]]]]. exists tr1, tr2. split. + apply Hincl, Hd1. + split; auto. - destruct Ht as [tr1 Ht1]. destruct IHn as [tr2 [Hd1 [Hd2 Heq]]]. exists tr1, tr2. split. + apply traces_app_mono with (d3 := d1); auto. + split; auto.
